turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get the order going. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want four small thick-crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one meat lovers, one supreme, one Mexican pizza, and one with ground beef, onions, and bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, i don't see mexican pizza on their menu. did you want to tell me what's in that pizza, so we can see if we can make it a custom order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's fine. Just give me a plain tea instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. the order you want is for 4 small thick crust pizzas, 1 meat lovers, 1 supreme, 1 with ground beef, onions and bacon, 1 cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $42.45 is the total, did you want me to submit the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, go ahead and place the order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed your order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need assistance with anything else?
